title: The Gloomy Me in Class is Actually the Vocalist of a Very Popular Band - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Anti-social Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Clever Protagonist   Cross-dressing   Dense Protagonist   Famous Protagonist   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Part-Time Job   Secret Identity   Secrets   Showbiz   Sister Complex   Younger Sisters
author: Yozakura Yuno   夜桜ユノ
description:
Rintsuki Suda, who attends Shirahoshi High School, is a gloomy and dull student at school.

However, his real identity is Shion Nanairo – the vocalist of the band [Personia] – which is very popular among middle and high school students.

Classes always revolve around Shion, a mysterious and charismatic singer, whose eyes are always hidden by a mask.

Rintsuki hides his identity and stays in the shadows during class. It’s all about not disturbing his family and his beloved sister!

Surrounded by his classmates who are his enthusiastic fans, he would break into a cold sweat while…..>
